
                            
                            <p>已经连续三天领了，永辉真阔气 <br> 永辉生活APP，进入领券中心，然后返回，自动弹出，没有弹的可以多试几次。 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/07/221907xf2sm2sgssksv2wu.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/07/221907xf2sm2sgssksv2wu.jpg"> <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/07/221913v22y3yx2kyryjr3y.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/07/221913v22y3yx2kyryjr3y.jpg"> <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/07/221918b6k5tttnz9i9bvf1.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/07/221918b6k5tttnz9i9bvf1.jpg"> <br> </p>
